title:
I travel to  Wilmington six or eight times a year and used to love to visit

the St. John\'s Art Museum downtown.  Why

did it close?
text:
It is now the Cameron Art Museum, in a new location.

Here's a link to a story with more information:

http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100424/ARTICLES/100429792/1004?Title=Cameron-Art-Museum-struggles-to-balance-ambition-with-local-interests
